dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1494 IS: Noninsured Crop Disaster Assistance Program Enhancement Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Rounds (for himself, Ms. Lummis, Ms. Smith, Mr. Welch, and Mr. Cramer) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Agriculture Improvement and Reform Act of 1996 to make additional coverage under the Noninsured Crop Disaster Assistance Program available for crops and grasses used for grazing, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Noninsured Crop Disaster Assistance Program Enhancement Act of 2025.

subsection.text: Section 196 of the Federal Agriculture Improvement and Reform Act of 1996 (7 U.S.C. 7333) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(1)(A)(ii), by striking except in the case of crops and grasses used for grazing,; and
in subsection (l)(1), in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by striking (other than for crops and grasses used for grazing).

subsection.text: Not later than 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Agriculture shall promulgate regulations to carry out the amendments made by subsection (a).
